configurationItems.name: url
configurationItems.description: Define the URL of the service

configurationItems.name: key
configurationItems.description: Define the API key

configurationItems.name: certverify
configurationItems.description: Verify certificates

configurationItems.name: certpath
configurationItems.description: Path to certificate file, in case of self-signed etc.

configurationItems.name: verdict_only
configurationItems.description: If set to true, only the verdict (or the score for VMRay versions < 4.0) will be added as labels.

configurationItems.name: query_retry_wait
configurationItems.description: The amount of seconds to wait before trying to fetch the results.

configurationItems.name: recursive_sample_limit
configurationItems.description: The maximum amount of recursive samples which will be analyzed. 0 disables recursion.

configurationItems.name: reanalyze
configurationItems.description: If set to true, known samples will be re-analyzed on submission. This is enabled by default.

configurationItems.name: shareable
configurationItems.description: If set to true, the hash of the sample will be shared with VirusTotal if the TLP level is white or green.

configurationItems.name: archive_password
configurationItems.description: The password that will be used to extract archives.

configurationItems.name: archive_compound_sample
configurationItems.description: If set to true, files inside archives are treated as a single, compound sample. Otherwise, each file is treated as its own sample.

configurationItems.name: max_jobs
configurationItems.description: Limits the amount of jobs that can be created by jobrules for a submission.

configurationItems.name: enable_reputation
configurationItems.description: If set to true, reputation lookups will be performed for submitted samples and analysis artifacts (file hash and URL lookups) by the VMRay cloud reputation service and additional third party services. The user analyzer setting is used as default value for this parameter.

configurationItems.name: enable_whois
configurationItems.description: If set to true, domains seen during analyses are queried with external WHOIS service. The user analyzer setting is used as default value for this parameter.

configurationItems.name: analyzer_mode
configurationItems.description: Specifies which types of analyzers will be used for analyzing this sample. Supported strings are 'reputation', 'reputation_static', 'reputation_static_dynamic', 'static_dynamic', and 'static'. The user analyzer setting is used as default value for this parameter.

configurationItems.name: known_malicious
configurationItems.description: If set to true, triage will be used to pre-filter known malicious samples by results of reputation lookup (if allowed) and static analysis. The user analyzer setting is used as default value for this parameter.

configurationItems.name: known_benign
configurationItems.description: If set to true, triage will be used to pre-filter known benign samples by results of reputation lookup (if allowed) and static analysis. The user analyzer setting is used as default value for this parameter.

configurationItems.name: tags
configurationItems.description: Tags to attach to the sample.

configurationItems.name: timeout
configurationItems.description: Analysis timeout in seconds.

configurationItems.name: net_scheme_name
configurationItems.description: Name of the network schema.
